overview: Nacha, a secondary character in 'Copla', narrates the real interiorities of the Luis-Lola couple in their love crisis with the arrival of Manuel. The story unfolds differently from what happened in 'Copla', because Luis comes to the conclusion that he loves that Lola is loved by Manuel. Everything happens during the preparation and filming of 'Copla'.
title: Amo que te amen
